entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM ADT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11 except minus 16 in the Natuashish area. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11 except minus 16 in the Natuashish area. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 06:00 AM ADT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 22. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM ADT Saturday 18 March 2023
